readable.title: 2662262499_3cdf49cedd
readable.content: A baseball hitter holding a bat falling down . A baseball player runs on the field . A boy at bat playing a baseball game falls to the ground while onlookers watch . A child in a uniform is falling to the ground with a bat in his or her hand . This baseball player , dressed in red and white uniform and holding a bat , is falling after being hit by a pitch .
